segments.text: I can't help but laugh at the absurdity of this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes while water pours all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it's so wobbly, it's hilarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, like it's the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a great contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just too funny, I can't stop laughing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens, but it's just so entertaining to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could be there to see what happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR
